body: I wish i could read japinse

This went from almost vanilla to monkey's paw wish granting in like two pages. Basically, guy makes a wish to get a beautiful wife, Suwako decides to crash with him for a year and gets pregnant. Then she tells him she needs to go back. Three years later a girl claiming to be Suwako's daughter shows up at his door, who turns out to be the child the protag fathered with her, and is there to be his wife (thus fulfilling his wish).
